# OneNoteProxy.GetCurrentSearchScopeID method

Get the OneNote of a current node in the page hierarchy (notebook, section group, or section) below which to search for content.

```csharp
public string GetCurrentSearchScopeID(SearchScope scope)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| scope | Search scope. |

## Return Value

The OneNote object id of the current node associated with the given scope.
